languages.text: "А, а тебе так бы этого хотелось, да? Нет уж. Лорд-капитану я еще нужна — так что засунь свое разочарование куда-нибудь... подальше".
"You mean you'd prefer it, isn't that right? Not a chance. The Lord Captain still needs me — so take your disappointment and shove it."
languages.original_text: "А, а тебе так бы этого хотелось, да? Нет уж. Лорд-капитану я еще нужна — так что засунь свое разочарование куда-нибудь... подальше".

traits.locale_text: "You mean you'd prefer it, isn't that right? Not a chance. The Lord Captain still needs me — so take your disappointment and shove it."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You mean you'd prefer it, isn't that right? Not a chance. The Lord Captain still needs me — so take your disappointment and shove it."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You mean you'd prefer it, isn't that right? Not a chance. The Lord Captain still needs me — so take your disappointment and shove it."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You mean you'd prefer it, isn't that right? Not a chance. The Lord Captain still needs me — so take your disappointment and shove it."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “你想说的是，你更希望我留在这些异端分子身边，是吧？想都别想。舰长大人还需要我，所以你还是少给自己找点不开心吧。”
languages.original_text: "You mean you'd prefer it, isn't that right? Not a chance. The Lord Captain still needs me — so take your disappointment and shove it."

traits.locale_text: “你想说的是，你更希望我留在这些异端分子身边，是吧？想都别想。舰长大人还需要我，所以你还是少给自己找点不开心吧。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Vous voulez dire que c'est ce que vous, vous préféreriez, non ? Aucune chance. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a encore besoin de moi, alors vous pouvez toujours vous fourrer vos espoirs déçus là où je pense. »
languages.original_text: "You mean you'd prefer it, isn't that right? Not a chance. The Lord Captain still needs me — so take your disappointment and shove it."

traits.locale_text: « Vous voulez dire que c'est ce que vous, vous préféreriez, non ? Aucune chance. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a encore besoin de moi, alors vous pouvez toujours vous fourrer vos espoirs déçus là où je pense. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «La que preferiría eso eres tú, ¿no? La llevas clara. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán sigue necesitándome, así que métete la decepción donde te quepa».
languages.original_text: "You mean you'd prefer it, isn't that right? Not a chance. The Lord Captain still needs me — so take your disappointment and shove it."

traits.locale_text: «La que preferiría eso eres tú, ¿no? La llevas clara. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán sigue necesitándome, así que métete la decepción donde te quepa».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「それがいいって、本気？絶対お断り。ロード・キャプテンはまだ私を必要としてる…さぞがっかりしたでしょう、残念だったわね」
languages.original_text: "You mean you'd prefer it, isn't that right? Not a chance. The Lord Captain still needs me — so take your disappointment and shove it."

traits.locale_text: 「それがいいって、本気？絶対お断り。ロード・キャプテンはまだ私を必要としてる…さぞがっかりしたでしょう、残念だったわね」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr meint, Ihr würdet es vorziehen, nicht wahr? Vergesst es. Der Lord Captain braucht mich weiterhin. Also steckt Euch Eure Enttäuschung in den Arsch."
languages.original_text: "You mean you'd prefer it, isn't that right? Not a chance. The Lord Captain still needs me — so take your disappointment and shove it."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr meint, Ihr würdet es vorziehen, nicht wahr? Vergesst es. Der Lord Captain braucht mich weiterhin. Also steckt Euch Eure Enttäuschung in den Arsch."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "You mean you'd prefer it, isn't that right? Not a chance. The Lord Captain still needs me — so take your disappointment and shove it."

languages.text: "Sen tercih ederdin ama ben sen değilim. Avucunu yala. Lord Kaptan'ın bana ihtiyacı var. Hayal kırıklığını da al ve kaybol."
languages.original_text: "You mean you'd prefer it, isn't that right? Not a chance. The Lord Captain still needs me — so take your disappointment and shove it."

traits.locale_text: "Sen tercih ederdin ama ben, sen değilim. Avucunu yala. Lord Kaptan'ın bana ihtiyacı var. Hayal kırıklığını da al ve kaybol."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
